author: Josh Dzieza
title: Exclusive: Detroit Amazon workers plan to walk out over handling of COVID-19
description: Three people have tested positive for COVID-19 at the Detroit facility, and workers are demanding Amazon close it for cleaning. The walkout is the latest in a growing wave of protests over worker safety during the pandemic.
content:
In a growing wave of protests, workers are demanding Amazon close the warehouse for cleaning
Amazon workers at a fulfillment center near Detroit, Michigan, plan to walk out over the companys handling of COVID-19. Workers at the facility, called DTW1, say man… [+6964 chars]
